name: Forbidden Love (itch)
description:
Fishing Game

Extreme fishing gameplay! 

Use the left and right arrow keys to control the hook's lateral motion.

Use the Spacebar to dive deeper into the water. Press space multiple times to go deeper.

Collect 3 worms, and spawn Bait using "Q".

Once you spawn bait, try to catch a fish.

Be warned though...there's more to catching a fish than using bait...

A game by Abhi and Kevin for Ludum Dare 41.
